Flow.description: This flow will prompt the user to enter any other contact details and then convert the lead to an account and also notify business customer service and our accounts departnment.
Flow.label: Convert Lead (Channel)

recordLookups.description: Go and get the current channel lead which we will be wanting to convert into an account
recordLookups.name: Get_Current_Lead
recordLookups.label: Get Current Lead

fields.name: Lead_Information_Text
fields.fieldText:
Current Channel Lead Information


Name: {!Get_Current_Lead.Name}

Email: {!Get_Current_Lead.Email}

Telephone: {!Get_Current_Lead.Phone}

Mobile: {!Get_Current_Lead.MobilePhone}

fields.name: Alternative_Primary_Contact_Tet
fields.fieldText: Alternative Primary Partner Contact

textTemplates.name: Email_Body_Lead
textTemplates.text:
NEW CHANNEL PARTNER ALERT


Hi BCS and Accounts,


Company Information:

  • Legal Company Name: {!Get_Created_Account.Name}
  • Salesforce Account ID: {!Get_Created_Account.M12_Account_Number__c}
  • Billing Address: {!Get_Created_Account.BillingStreet}, {!Get_Created_Account.BillingCity}, {!Get_Created_Account.BillingState}, {!Get_Created_Account.BillingPostalCode}, {!Get_Created_Account.BillingCountry}

Primary Contact (Used for all communication):

  • Name: {!Get_Current_Lead.Name}
  • Role & Department: {!Get_Current_Lead.Title}, {!Get_Current_Lead.Job_Role_Department__c}
  • Email: {!Get_Current_Lead.Email}
  • Phone: {!Get_Current_Lead.Phone}
  • Mobile: {!Get_Current_Lead.MobilePhone}

textTemplates.name: Email_Body_Lead_and_Primary_Contact
textTemplates.text:
NEW CHANNEL PARTNER ALERT


Hi BCS and Accounts,


Company Information:

  • Legal Company Name: {!Get_Created_Account.Name}
  • Salesforce Account ID: {!Get_Created_Account.M12_Account_Number__c}
  • Billing Address: {!Get_Created_Account.BillingStreet}, {!Get_Created_Account.BillingCity}, {!Get_Created_Account.BillingState}, {!Get_Created_Account.BillingPostalCode}, {!Get_Created_Account.BillingCountry}

Primary Contact:

  • Name: {!Alternative_Primary_Contact_Variable.FirstName} {!Alternative_Primary_Contact_Variable.LastName}
  • Role & Department: {!Alternative_Primary_Contact_Variable.Title}, {!Send_Email_3_Contacts}{!Alternative_Primary_Contact_Variable.Job_Role_Department__c}
  • Email: {!Alternative_Primary_Contact_Variable.Email}
  • Phone: {!Alternative_Primary_Contact_Variable.Phone}
  • Mobile: {!Alternative_Primary_Contact_Variable.MobilePhone}

Additional Contact (original contact):

  • Name: {!Get_Current_Lead.Name}
  • Role & Department: {!Get_Current_Lead.Title}, {!Get_Current_Lead.Job_Role_Department__c}
  • Email: {!Get_Current_Lead.Email}
  • Phone: {!Get_Current_Lead.Phone}
  • Mobile: {!Get_Current_Lead.MobilePhone}

NEW CHANNEL PARTNER ALERT

Primary Contact:

  • Name: {!Alternative_Primary_Contact_Variable.FirstName} {!Alternative_Primary_Contact_Variable.LastName}
  • Role & Department: {!Alternative_Primary_Contact_Variable.Title}, {!Send_Email_3_Contacts}{!Alternative_Primary_Contact_Variable.Job_Role_Department__c}

  • Phone: {!Alternative_Primary_Contact_Variable.Phone}

  • Email: {!Billing_Contact_Variable.Email}
  • Phone: {!Billing_Contact_Variable.Phone}
  • Mobile: {!Billing_Contact_Variable.MobilePhone}

  • Name: {!Get_Current_Lead.Name}

  • Email: {!Get_Current_Lead.Email}
  • Phone: {!Get_Current_Lead.Phone}
  • Mobile: {!Get_Current_Lead.MobilePhone}
